page.title: 07LEISURE WARWICK BRIDGE
page.content: For leisure some people go fishing or play football,some people like to go to pubs to talk,drink or play darts,dominoes or pool. Taking dogs for a walk and doing D.I.Y.jobs at home is what some people like to do.Local entertainment facilities include Downagate playing field.Some self entertainment's are going to Carlisle where a new shopping centre called the Lanes has opened, this causes a great attraction as well as the Sands Leisure Centre which is also new. Restaurants,pubs,night clubs,and concerts are dotted about Carlisle. Facilities in the area include pubs, a community centre, village halls, playing fields and the river Eden. Fishing is very expensive on this river.
